programme.title: A National Figure of Charm and Pity
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers the sole survivor of a capsized boat full of illegal immigrants.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke discusses the case of 6 year old Cuban Elian Gonzalez, the sole survivor of a group of would-be illegal immigrants whose boat capsized off the Florida coast.
